.class public auto ansi sealed TreeNodeEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub TreeNodeEventHandler(sender As Object, e As TreeNodeEventArgs)
public delegate void TreeNodeEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, TreeNodeEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将对 控件的以下事件进行处理的方法：、、 或 。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the , , , or event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用委托以编程方式注册的事件处理方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the delegate to register an event-handling method programmatically. [!code-aspx-csharp[TreeViewTreeNodeEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodeEventHandler/CS/treeviewtreenodeeventhandlercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TreeViewTreeNodeEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TreeViewTreeNodeEventHandler/VB/treeviewtreenodeeventhandlervb.aspx#1)]
